source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I have come, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Da bin ich, <var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Nothin' fer ye to worry about.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Kein Grund zur Hektik! Da bin ich doch.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>You summoned?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Du hast gerufen?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Yes? <sigh> I hope this doesn't take long...
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Ja, bitte? <seufz> Ich hoffe, das dauert nicht allzu lang ...

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>You wish to see how a master handles a bazaar?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Du möchtest sehen, wie ein Meister die Märkte im Griff hat?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Hello, hello! You called?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Hallo, hallo! Du hast gerufen?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>At your service, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Zu Diensten, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>What's it to be this time, love?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Was gibt es diesmal, <var 08 E905 ((Süße)) ((Süßer)) /var>?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>What would you ask?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Was ist dein Begehr?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>I'm so sorry to keep you waiting, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. So very, very sorry.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Hab ich dich warten lassen? 'Tschuldigung.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Quickly now, I've places to be.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Beeilung, ich hab noch andere Dinge zu erledigen.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Well, if it ain't my favorite client! Always a pleasure, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Wenn das nicht <var 08 E905 ((meine Lieblingsauftraggeberin)) ((mein Lieblingsauftraggeber)) /var> ist! Ist mir wie immer ein Vergnügen, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Yes, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>? What is your bidding?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Ja, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>? Wie kann ich Euch behilflich sein?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>What's on the agenda, chief? Deprivin' saps o' their hard-earned gil?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Was steht an, <var 08 E905 ((Chefin)) ((Boss)) /var>? Ein paar arme Tölpel um ihre schwer verdienten Gil bringen?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I have come. You may proceed.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Hier bin ich. Nennt Euer Begehr.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Oh, hello there. To what do I owe the pleasure?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Oh, hallo. Warum beehrt Ihr mich?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I am come to conduct business, and only business.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Ich bin geschäftlich hier, rein geschäftlich.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>You look to be in good health, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. How may I assist you this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((eve)) ((morn)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((eve)) /var>)) /var>?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Ihr seht blendend aus, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>. Wie kann ich Euch helfen?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>What is it you would have me do, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Was möchtet Ihr mir auftragen, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Usually, it's me doin' the summons and others doin' the waitin'.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Normalerweise rufe <var 1A 02 /var>ich<var 1A 01 /var> Leute herbei und lasse <var 1A 02 /var>andere<var 1A 01 /var> warten.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Is there something that I can help you with?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Gibt es etwas, bei dem ich Euch helfen kann?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Oh, why must you summon me at a time like this...?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Och nö, warum müsst Ihr mich zu solch einer Unzeit herbeirufen ...?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>I'm sure there is a perfectly good explanation for this summons.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Ich bin mir sicher, Ihr habt einen guten Grund für Euer Rufen.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>You know, I thought you might be along to summon me. You may rest assured that I am ready and eager to serve.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>He, ich wusste, dass Ihr mich rufen würdet. Seid versichert, dass für mich kein Auftrag zu schwer ist.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Hail to thee, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Your humble servant has heard your summons.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Seid gegrüßt, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>. Euer treuer Diener hat Euer Rufen erhört.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Greetin's and salutations, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. Pray speak yer desires, an' I'll do me damndest to see 'em done.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Ja, bitte? Sag mir, was du willst, und ich werde sehen, was ich tun kann.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I was wondering when you'd get around to calling me.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Ich habe mich schon gefragt, wann du mich rufen würdest.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Mind if we keep this brief? I've got a pretty little thing that's waitin' for me.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Können wir das kurz halten? Ich habe da noch etwas zu erledigen.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>What?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Was willst du?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I'm here, I'm here!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Ich bin hier, ich bin hier!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Here I am, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>, as per your request.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Hier bin ich, <var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>. Stets zu Diensten.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>'Ello, dearie. What's on the docket?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Hi, <var 08 E905 ((Süße)) ((Süßer)) /var>. Was steht an?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>I never miss a chance to line these pockets.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Ich lasse mir keine Gelegenheit entgehen, mir die Taschen zu füllen.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Well, this is unexpected! What'll it be?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Nun, das kommt unerwartet! Was gibt's?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>What is it now?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Was ist denn nun schon wieder?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Here I aaaaaam!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Hier bin ich! Hallooo!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>How may I be of serrrvice, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Wie kann ich Euch zu Diensten sein, <var 08 E905 ((Frrräulein)) ((Herrr)) /var>?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>It's a war out there, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. You have no idea.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Da draußen ist Krieg, <var 08 E905 ((Mädel)) ((Junge)) /var>. Du hast ja keine Ahnung.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>...
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>... Was gibt es?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Business or pleasure?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Geschäftlich oder privat?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I presume you did not summon me solely for the pleasure of my company.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Ich nehme an, du hast mich nicht gerufen, weil dir langweilig ist.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Just the <var 08 E905 ((fair maiden)) ((handsome fellow)) /var> I was hoping to see! Tell me your heart's desire.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Genau <var 08 E905 ((die schöne junge Frau)) ((der hübsche junge Mann)) /var>, auf <var 08 E905 ((die)) ((den)) /var> ich gewartet habe! Was kann ich für dich tun?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I hope your catcall is not one of disapproval.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Ich hoffe, ich werde Euch zufriedenstellen können.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Ye rang, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Du hast gerufen, <var 08 E905 ((Mädchen)) ((Junge)) /var>?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>A cat's ears do not miss much―least of all a summons.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Meinen Katzenohren entgeht nichts - schon gar nicht dein Rufen.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Curiosity called the cat. What do you have for me today?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Die Neugier ruft die Katze herbei. Was kann ich heute für dich tun?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Ready when you are.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Ich wär so weit.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>I was just thinking of you!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>He, ich habe gerade an dich gedacht!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>What need have you of me today, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Welches Anliegen habt Ihr heute, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Bwahahaha! Ye got work needs gettin' done? Just point me in the right bloody direction.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Harhar! Du hast was zu erledigen? Spuck's nur aus.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I've come. What is it?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Da bin ich. Was liegt an?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Hey there─hic─<var 08 E905 ((missy)) ((mate)) /var>! Care to join me fer a pint?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Hallo ... <hicks> ... <var 08 E905 ((Kleines)) ((mein Freund)) /var>! Trinken wir einen zusammen?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Couldn't come no quicker. Where's the work?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Schneller konnte ich nicht kommen. Gibt's Arbeit?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I came runnin' soon as I heard the bell! Ye need somethin', chief?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Ich bin sofort losgerannt, als ich die Glocke hörte! Brauchst du etwas?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I am at your disposal, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Ich stehe Euch zu Diensten, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Ye got somethin' fer me, cap'n?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Hast du was für mich, Käpt'n?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Go ahead, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Melde mich zum Dienst, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Let's keep this short and sweet, shall we?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Lass uns die Sache schnell erledigen, ja?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>This wouldn't be necessary if you entrusted your financial affairs to me.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Das wäre nicht nötig, wenn du deine Finanzen mir überlassen würdest.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>So─sellin', buyin', drinkin', whorin'? What's it to be today?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Also ... verkaufen, kaufen, trinken? Was steht heute an?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. How may I be of service?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Wie kann ich Euch zu Diensten sein, <var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>What'll it be, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mate)) /var>?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Sag, was Sache ist, dann bin ich wieder weg.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>State your business.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Kann ich etwas für Euch erledigen, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>And how does this wonderful <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> find you?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Schöner Tag heute, nicht wahr? Perfekt für eine Unternehmung.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Well... Here I am...<var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Was ist denn nun schon wieder? Ich wollte mir gerade einen Becher Reiswein einschenken ...

source:
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE6We work the market stalls,♪
And our uniforms are pretty;♪
We are sober men and true,♪
And attentive to our duties!♪
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Schön, Euch zu sehen! Was liegt an?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab><var 08 E905 ((My lady)) ((My lord)) /var>. What would you ask of me?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Wie kann ich Euch zu Diensten sein, <var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>So. We doing this?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Fass dich kurz, ich hab schon genug um die Ohren.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Yes?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Bitte, sprecht. Was habt Ihr auf dem Herzen?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Hey, it's...it's you! Hello again, you!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Hallöchen, was steht an, was steht an?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>I-It's not like I want to sell your items or anything.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Hab ich da was klingeln gehört?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>What do you have for me? Come on, come on! Don't be shy!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Na, hast du mich vermisst, <var 08 E905 ((Kleine)) ((Kleiner)) /var>?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>You rang, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Stets zu Diensten, <var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>. Was liegt Euch auf dem Herzen?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>I trust this will be worth my while.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Was willst du von mir? Bild dir nicht ein, dass ich dir den Diener mach, <var 08 E905 ((Kleine)) ((Kleiner)) /var>.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab><var 1A 02 /var>What<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Oh, ein Auftrag<var 1D /var>...? Ich hoffe, es is' wichtig.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Whatever you need, leave it to me! I have my methods.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Also dann, <var 08 E905 ((Frau Abenteurerin)) ((Herr Abenteurer)) /var>. Was kann ich denn für dich tun?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Gahaha! If it isn't my favorite <var 08 E905 ((mistress)) ((master)) /var>!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Hm, was? Hast du nach mir gerufen? Hätte ich fast nicht mitbekommen.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>It is I, your most loyal and capable retainer!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Grrrahaha! Na, spuck schon aus, was steht an?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>What will it be, love?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Na, Herzchen? Was darf ich denn heute für dich tun, hm?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Your orders! I would hear them at once!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Ein Auftrag? Bah, kannst du nicht jemand anderen fragen<var 1D /var>...?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>If there is something you would ask of me, then ask it.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Zu Diensten. Bitte komm zur Sache, ich bin reichlich beschäftigt.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Yes...? Is there something you─<yawn>─need?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Oh, ich wurde gerufen! Wie aufregend! Endlich ein bisschen Abwechslung.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>A task for me? I hope it's something fun!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Ja ja, anwesend. Was gibt's?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>I am here to do your every bidding, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>! Ask of me anything at all!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Ich?! O-Oh, ja, hier! Darf ich mich nützlich machen?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I have been awaiting your summons, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. What would you have of me this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Ich hatte schon geahnt, dass du mich an diesem wundervollen <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Abend)) ((Morgen)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Tag)) ((Abend)) /var>)) /var> rufen würdest! Was kann ich für dich tun?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>What can I do for ye, yer <var 08 E905 ((ladyship)) ((lordship)) /var>?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((n'Abend)) ((Moin)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Tach)) ((n'Abend)) /var>)) /var>, <var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>. Was gibt's?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>You called, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>...?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Ihr verlangt nach mir, <var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>You─hic─rang?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>War das grad - <hick> - die Klingel?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Need my assistance, do you? Let's make this quick, then.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Du hast mich gerufen? Also gut. Wie lautet der nächste Auftrag?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>You have my ear, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. Both of them, in fact!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Ich bin ganz Ohr, <var 08 E905 ((meine treueste Dame)) ((mein treuster Herr)) /var>. Dein Wunsch ist mir Befehl!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>If that is all, I will take my leave now, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Dann werde ich mich nun zurückziehen. Mit Verlaub ...

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Take care o' yerself, hear?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Ich soll auf mich aufpassen? Wer bist du, meine Mutter?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Until we next meet.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Bis zum nächsten Mal.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Well, it's about time. Good-bye.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Nun, wurde ja auch Zeit. Wieder<var 16 /var>sehen!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I believe thanks are in order.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Ich denke, ein Dank wäre angebracht.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I'm off, then!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Ich geh dann mal!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>With your leave, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Mit Eurer Erlaubnis, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Don't you worry 'bout a thing. I got this.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Mach dir keinen Kopf. Ich regel das.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Farewell, then.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Leb wohl.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>If there is nothing else, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, I'll be going now.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Wenn sonst nichts anliegt, breche ich dann mal auf.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Is that all? Very well, until next time.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Ist das alles? Gut, dann bis zum nächsten Mal.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Oh, will that be all today? Very well, but promise me you'll come back soon!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Oh, war's das für heute? Nun, versprich mir, bald wiederzukommen!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>As always, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, it has been an honor and a privilege.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Es war mir wie immer eine Ehre und ein Vergnügen, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>You can count on me, chief─I know how to get things done.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Du kannst auf mich zählen, <var 08 E905 ((Chefin)) ((Boss)) /var> - ich weiß, wie der Hase hier läuft.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Don't be a stranger.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Meldet Euch mal wieder.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>I swear it shall be done. Eventually.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Ich schwöre, ich werd's erledigen. Irgendwann mal.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>As you wish.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Wie Ihr wünscht.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Capital! I shall carry out your orders forthwith.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Großartig! Ich werde mich sofort drum kümmern.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I humbly await your next summons, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Ich werde auf Euer nächstes Rufen warten, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Don't leave me alone for too long, hear?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Lass mich nicht zu lang allein, hörst du?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Always a pleasure.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>War mir wie immer ein Vergnügen.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>That will be all, yes? Then if you would excuse me...
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Das wäre alles? Wenn Ihr mich dann entschuldigen würdet ...

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>I believe that concludes our dealings for now.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Ich denke, damit ist unser Handel fürs Erste erledigt.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Are you certain you don't desire anything else? Anything at all? Very well, I shall take my leave.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr sonst nichts braucht? Wirklich? Gut, mit Verlaub ...

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Your every whim shall be swiftly carried out with due care and consideration.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Eure Anliegen werden zügig und mit größter Sorgfalt erledigt.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Shouldn't take more than a moment, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Ich geh dann mal.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I'll be going, then.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Sollte nicht lange dauern, <var 08 E905 ((Chefin)) ((Boss)) /var>.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Thank the gods we're finished. I've got plans to put my hands in places I've never seen...if you know what I mean.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Den Göttern sei Dank, dass wir hier fertig sind. Ich hab noch so einiges zu erledigen ...

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Be well.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Mach's gut.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I'm off, I'm off!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Ich bin dann mal weg, tschüssi!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Until we meet again!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Einen schönen Tag wünsche ich Euch noch.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Blessin's o' the Twelve upon ye.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Möge Nald'thal unsere Taschen mit klingender Münze füllen!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>May Nald'thal see fit to fatten our pockets!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Der Segen der Zwölf sei mit dir.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Very good, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Your wish is my command, and so forth.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Sehr gut! Dein Wunsch ist mir Befehl und so.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>You know how to reach me.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Du weißt ja, wie du mich findest.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Is it time for good-byes already? I'm going to miss you...
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Oh, schon Zeit für den Abschied? Du wirst mir fehlen ...

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Thy will be done.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Ich werde Euer Anliegen umgehend erledigen.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>The markets may be a bleedin' battlefield, but I'm a godsdamned soldier. You can count on me, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Die Märkte sind ein verdammtes Schlachtfeld, aber ich bin ein Vollblutsoldat. Du kannst auf mich zählen.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>...
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>... Ich geh.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Why so serrrious? <sigh> So it goes.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Warum denn so errrnst? <seufz> Dann mal los.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I hardly think that warranted my personal appearance, but what is done is done.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Dafür hätte es mich nicht gebraucht, aber nun ist es wohl zu spät.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Then I have satisfied your every need? Excellent! I do so take pleasure in servicing my clients.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Dann bist du also zufrieden? Ausgezeichnet! Ich freue mich, dass ich dir helfen konnte.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Good-bye for now, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sirrr)) /var>.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Auf Wieder<var 16 /var>sehen, Abenteurrrer<var 08 E905 ((in)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Right then, let's get on with it!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Alles klar, dann mal los!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>There is no call for concerrrn.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Es gibt keinen Grund zur Sorrrge.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>When the master's away, the cat will play.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Ist <var 08 E905 ((die Meisterin)) ((der Meister)) /var> aus dem Haus, tanzt die Katze auf dem Tisch.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Gods, this is tirin'...
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Bei den Göttern, das ist ermüdend ...

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>You don't want to be with me anymore? <sniffle>
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Du benötigst mich nicht mehr? <schnüff>

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I shall carry out your wishes as instructed, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Ich werde Eure Anweisungen genauestens befolgen, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Bwahahaha! I'm in yer bazaar, sellin' yer wares!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Harhar! Auf zum Markt, um die Sachen zu verscheuern!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I will go now.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Ich werde dann mal gehen.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Awww, bugger. Reckon I best get to work...
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Och, schade. Ich mach mich dann wohl mal an die Arbeit ...

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I don't do good-byes.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Ich mag keine Verabschiedungen.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Go and grab yourself some shut-eye, chief. You look terrible!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Gönn dir mal 'ne Mütze Schlaf, <var 08 E905 ((Chefin)) ((Boss)) /var>. Du siehst furchtbar aus!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Will that be all for today, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>? Understood.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Wäre das alles für heute, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>? Dann ziehe ich mich zurück.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Aye, aye, cap'n!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Aye, aye, Käpt'n.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Duly noted.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Hab's notiert.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Not exactly how I was hopin' to spend my day, but I suppose it can't be helped.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Das hatte ich heute eigentlich nicht vor, aber es hilft wohl alles nicht.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Ours is not to reason why. Ours is but to do and die.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Wir überlegen nicht lang, wir packen an.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Ever the consummate professional, I see. Another time, then.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Wie immer rein geschäftlich, wie ich sehe. Bis zum nächsten Mal dann.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>If there is nothing else, then I shall take my leave.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Dann werde ich mich nun zurückziehen. Mit Verlaub ...

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Is that all? Guess I'll be on my way, then.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Wenn das alles war, verzieh ich mich mal wieder.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Any last requests? Very well. Heh heh heh... Ahem.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Es war mir eine Freude, Euch wiederzusehen.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Ah, yes, of course. Duty calls!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Dann flitz ich mal los.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>You are finished with me, then?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Wenn das mal gut geht ...

source:
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE6Here today and gone tomorrow;♪
Yes, I know─♪
That is so!♪
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Dann mal in die Hände gespuckt!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>If ever you have need of me, just ring.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Mit Eurer Erlaubnis ziehe ich mich zurück.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Always a pleasure, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Und dafür breche ich mein Schönheitsbad ab? Ts ...

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Right, then.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Ich wünsche noch einen schönen Tag.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Finished already? Guess that's that, then.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Gern geschehen. Bis dann!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>You're leaving already? Fine, then! I-It's not like I wanted you to stay or anything.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Ich geh dann mal ...

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Very good, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Very good indeed!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Bis zum nächsten Mal! <zwinker>

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Always a pleasure to serve, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Zögert nicht, jederzeit wieder nach mir zu rufen, <var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Hmph. I hope that next time you will have a more meaningful task for me.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>... Dass ich dafür überhaupt aufgestanden bin. Nächstes Mal hast du hoffentlich was Spannenderes für mich, <var 08 E905 ((Kleine)) ((Kleiner)) /var>.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Good-bye<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Wenn das alles war, dann ziehe ich mich jetzt zurück.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>And with that, I shall be off. Places to go, people to see.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab><var 08 E905 ((Frau Abenteurerin)) ((Herr Abenteurer)) /var>, man sieht sich. <zwinker>

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Bahahaha! Till next time, my friend!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Also dann<var 1D /var>... <gähn> Vielleicht reißt mich diese Klingel diesmal nicht aus meinen Träumen.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Ring for me whenever you please! You know that I will never let you down!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Verstanden, verstanden. Lange kannst du ja sowieso nicht auf mich verzichten! Har!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Must we part so soon?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Nun denn, bis zum nächsten Mal, Herzchen.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>And I am off!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Endlich fertig hier. Denk nicht mal dran, sofort wieder nach mir zu klingeln, hörst du?!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Call on me as you please. If I am so inclined, I will answer.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Ich ziehe mich zurück. Auf bald.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>That is all, I suppose...? <yawn> Very well...
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Schon fertig hier? Na schön. Zögere nicht, nach mir zu rufen!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>That is all? Oh, I was hoping there'd be more...
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Kann ich jetzt gehen?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Is that all you need of me? But I could yet serve you in so many ways!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab><var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>, ich bin immer hier, wenn Ihr mich braucht!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Do not hesitate to call upon me again. Fare you well in your endeavors, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Zögere nicht, mich erneut zu rufen, wenn dir der Sinn danach steht. Und alles Gute auf deinen Abenteuern!

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Just say the word, yer <var 08 E905 ((ladyship)) ((lordship)) /var>, and I'll be here with bells on.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Ein Wort und ich bin zur Stelle, Eure Meisterlichkeit. Is' klar, ne?

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>If you have no further need of my services...
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Wenn das dann alles wäre<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>I'm off for another glass, then. You know where to find me!
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Dann genehmige ich mir derweil noch ein Gläschen. Du weißt ja, wo du mich findest<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>What─is that it? Are you <var 1A 02 /var>sure<var 1A 01 /var> you need a retainer?
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Wie, das war's schon? Meinetwegen. Wenn du noch einen Auftrag hast, melde dich.

source: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Nothing else? Then I shall be hopping along.
target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Nichts weiter, also? Wie bedauerlich. Dann hoppel' ich eben davon<var 1D /var>...
